title: Blue Mountains Yoga Retreat Near Sydney
description: Escape the city for a revitalising yoga and wellness retreat amongst the beauty of the Blue Mountains National Park at Happy Buddha Retreats. Nestled in Wentworth Falls less than two hours from Sydney, this tranquil retreat offers the perfect opportunity to relax and reboot, with daily yoga suitable for all abilities, wholesome home-cooked vegetarian cuisine and a daily programme of activities including meditation.

vendor_name: Whispering Pines Chalet and Holiday Cottages
title: Blue Mountains Cottage Stay with Explorer Bus Pass
description: Discover the beauty of the Blue Mountains during a self-contained group getaway in Wentworth Falls, NSW. Stay in a cosy holiday cottage for four or six with three-day Blue Mountains Explorer Bus Pass included for all guests. The hop-on, hop-off service allows you to explore at your own pace, with live commentary and a free guidebook. Also includes a leisurely 12 noon checkout.
location_description: Whispering Pines Chalet and Holiday Cottages
